impressiveStats.title: Our Results in Numbers
impressiveStats.subtitle: Discover the real impact 1Card has made on campus management, security, and financial transactions across our growing community.

stats.title: of Partner Campuses Reduce Overhead Costs
stats.description: By unifying credential management and payment processing, 1Card streamlines campus operations, saving valuable time and resources.

stats.title: in Total Digital Transactions Processed

stats.title: of Users Report a More Convenient Campus Experience
stats.description: From canteen bills to parking, 1Card simplifies campus life with a single, all-in-one solution.

stats.title: Secure ID Verifications Completed
